data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The way in which media attention works can be exploited to produce ignorance. Other ____ that ____ it ____ that ____ or ____ do ____ reveal ____ facts. At ____, ____ force ____ facts ____ be ____ if ____ have ____ revealed. The methods they use include censorship, destroying documents, putting the weight of certain facts differently, or  being inattentive or forgetful.
data.partBlankContent: The way in which media attention works can be exploited to produce ignorance. Other fac____ that infl_____ it a__ that corpor______ or gover______ do n__ reveal cer____ facts. At ti___, th__ force th___ facts t_ be rem____ if th__ have be__ revealed. The methods they use include censorship, destroying documents, putting the weight of certain facts differently, or  being inattentive or forgetful.
data.fullContent: The way in which media attention works can be exploited to produce ignorance. Other factors that influence it are that corporations or governments do not reveal certain facts. At times, they force these facts to be removed if they have been revealed. The methods they use include censorship, destroying documents, putting the weight of certain facts differently, or being inattentive or forgetful.
data.answer: 人们可以利用媒体关注的方式来制造无知。影响它的其他因素是公司或政府没有揭示某些事实。有时，如果这些事实已经被揭露，他们会强制将其删除。他们使用的方法包括审查、销毁文件、以不同的方式衡量某些事实的重要性，或疏忽或健忘。
